auth.loginRequired: Log in first. Then you can send a question.

passkey.setupError: Try again. We couldn't set up your passkey.
passkey.setupCompleteDescription: You can now log in faster and more securely.
passkey.nudgeTitle: Worried someone might answer for you?
passkey.nudgeDescription: Use Face ID or Touch ID to log in faster and safer.
passkey.fasterTitle: Log in faster with a passkey
passkey.fasterDescription:
Log in with one tap using Face ID,
fingerprint, or device lock.

questions.inputPlaceholder: What would you like to ask?
questions.whoToAsk: How would you like to ask?
questions.termsAgreement: By sending a question, you agree to our <link>terms of service</link>.
questions.questionSent: Question sent. It goes public after they respond.

answers.deleteResponseDescription: Your answer will be removed. The question will go back to your inbox.

inbox.title: Inbox
inbox.declineDescription: It will be removed from your inbox. You won't be able to answer later.

settings.title: Settings
settings.anonymousRestrictionDescription: Limit anonymous questions to reduce unwanted messages.
settings.profileSettingsDescription: Set up your profile and social links.
settings.accountSettingsDescription: Manage your username, phone, and security.

notificationSettings.title: Notifications
notificationSettings.enableDescription: Get a notification when new questions arrive.
notificationSettings.unsupported: Try another browser. Push notifications aren't supported here.
notificationSettings.blocked: Enable notifications in your browser settings. They're blocked right now.
notificationSettings.permissionBlocked: Enable notifications in your browser settings. They're blocked.
notificationSettings.configError: Try again later. We couldn't set up notifications.
notificationSettings.subscribeError: Try again. We couldn't enable notifications.
notificationSettings.unsubscribeError: Try again. We couldn't disable notifications.
notificationSettings.testError: Try again. We couldn't send the test notification.

home.feedEmptyDescription: Be the first to ask a question.

questionSecurity.anyoneDescription: Anyone can send anonymous questions, even without signing up.
questionSecurity.verifiedDescription: Cuts down on abusive or low-quality anonymous questions.
questionSecurity.publicOnlyDescription: Only accept questions with the sender's name shown.

restrictions.anonymousLoginRequired: Log in first. Then you can ask anonymously.
restrictions.publicOnly: This user only accepts public questions.

errors.userNotFound: Check the link first. We couldn't find this user.
errors.profileLoadError: Try again. We couldn't load your profile.
errors.profileUpdateError: Try again. We couldn't update your profile.
errors.recipientAndContentRequired: Add a recipient and a question.
errors.publicQuestionLoginRequired: Log in to ask with your name visible.
errors.publicQuestionOnly: This user only accepts questions with your name visible.
errors.anonymousLoginRequired: Log in to send anonymous questions.
errors.questionCreateFailed: Try again. We couldn't send your question.
errors.questionCreateError: Try again. We couldn't send your question.
errors.questionIdAndContentRequired: Add a question ID and your answer.
errors.onlyRecipientCanAnswer: Only the recipient can answer this question.
errors.onlyRecipientCanDeleteQuestion: Only the recipient can delete this question.
errors.onlyRecipientCanDeleteAnswer: Only the recipient can delete this answer.
errors.questionDeleteError: Try again. We couldn't delete the question.
errors.answerCreateFailed: Try again. We couldn't save your answer.
errors.answerDeleteError: Try again. We couldn't delete your answer.
errors.answerCreateError: Try again. We couldn't save your answer.
errors.restoreError: Try again. We couldn't restore it.

friends.title: Friends
friends.description: See your friends' questions and answers.
friends.emptyDescription: When your friends answer, you'll see it here.

a2hs.title: Add to Home Screen
a2hs.description:
Open it like an app
and get notifications.

og.siteDescription: Ask anything and get honest answers.

signupPrompt.title: Get your own questions
signupPrompt.description:
Create your page and receive questions
from friends and followers.

landing.heroSubtitle: Create your Q&A page. Receive anonymous or named questions from anyone. Share your link and start chatting.
landing.step1Description: Sign up in seconds with your phone number.
landing.step2Description: Post your unique link on Instagram, X, or anywhere else.
landing.step3Description: Receive anonymous or named questions and reply right away.
landing.featuresSubtitle: Everything you need for real conversations.
landing.feature1Description: Share answers to Instagram Stories with beautiful cards. They're generated automatically.
landing.feature2Description: Anonymous askers verify by phone. It helps reduce spam and abuse.
landing.feature3Description: Break language barriers with AI translation. Ask and answer in any language.
landing.useCase1Description: Let your audience ask questions, then share your answers as content.
landing.useCase2Description: Have fun Q&A sessions with friends or your community.
landing.useCase3Description: Get anonymous feedback from colleagues, classmates, or followers.
landing.ctaTitle: Ready to hear what people really think?
landing.mockQuestion1: What book are you into lately?
